channel.title: anime on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in anime on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-29
item.description: Netflix’s new ‘Play Something’ shuffle feature is here to solve your movie night indecision (1 minute read) Play Something is a new feature for Netflix that automatically suggests new shows and movies.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-10
item.description: Hyundai purchases Boston Dynamics for $921M, makers of Spot dog robot (1 minute read) Hyundai has purchased Boston Dynamics for around $921 million.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-01
item.description: Nearby Sharing — Android’s AirDrop competitor — is rolling out now in beta (5 minute read) A beta test for Android’s Nearby Sharing feature is rolling out via the Play Services beta.
